00037 #define HAL_I2C_PRESCALER 0ul
00038 // \cond
00040 #if defined(AT91SAM7X256)
00041   /* AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_NO */
00042   #define  HAL_NO_INTERNAL_ADDRESS   (0x0 << 8)
00043   /* AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_1_BYTE */
00044   #define  HAL_ONE_BYTE_SIZE         (0x1 << 8)
00045   /* AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_2_BYTE */
00046   #define  HAL_TWO_BYTE_SIZE         (0x2 << 8)
00047   /* AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_3_BYTE */
00048   #define  HAL_THREE_BYTE_SIZE       (0x3 << 8)
00049 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1)
00050   #define  HAL_NO_INTERNAL_ADDRESS   0x0
00051   #define  HAL_ONE_BYTE_SIZE         0x1
00052   #define  HAL_TWO_BYTE_SIZE         0x2
00053   #define  HAL_THREE_BYTE_SIZE       0x3
00054 #endif
00055 // \endcond

00057 /******************************************************************************
00058                    Types section
00059 ******************************************************************************/
00061 #if defined(AT91SAM7X256)
00062   typedef enum
00063   {
00064     I2C_CLOCK_RATE_250 = F_CPU/(2*250000) - 3, // 200 Kb/s clock rate
00065     I2C_CLOCK_RATE_125 = F_CPU/(2*125000) - 3, // 125 Kb/s clock rate
00066     I2C_CLOCK_RATE_100 = F_CPU/(2*100000) - 3, // 100 Kb/s clock rate
00067     I2C_CLOCK_RATE_62  = F_CPU/(2*62500) - 3   // 62.5 Kb/s clock rate
00068   } I2cClockRate_t;
00069 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1)
00070   typedef enum
00071   {
00072     I2C_CLOCK_RATE_250 = ((F_CPU/250000ul) - 16ul)/(2ul * (1ul << HAL_I2C_PRESCALER) * (1ul << HAL_I2C_PRESCALER)), // 250 Kb/s clock rate
00073     I2C_CLOCK_RATE_125 = ((F_CPU/125000ul) - 16ul)/(2ul * (1ul << HAL_I2C_PRESCALER) * (1ul << HAL_I2C_PRESCALER)), // 125 Kb/s clock rate
00074     I2C_CLOCK_RATE_62  = ((F_CPU/62500ul) - 16ul)/(2ul * (1ul << HAL_I2C_PRESCALER) * (1ul << HAL_I2C_PRESCALER))   // 62.5 Kb/s clock rate
00075   } I2cClockRate_t;
00076 #endif
00077 
00079 typedef struct
00080 {
00081   I2cClockRate_t clockrate; // clock rate
00082 } HAL_i2cMode_t;

00104 #endif

00108   void (*f)(bool result);
